features: MAXIMUM STRENGTH MUCINEX DM COUGH & CHEST CONGESTION MEDICINE: Clinically proven to last up to 12 hours to control cough and provide relief for your severe chest congestion
POWERFUL SYMPTOM RELIEF: Maximum Strength Mucinex DM 12 hour controls cough, relieves chest congestion and thins & loosens mucus.
BI-LAYER TABLET: A unique bi-layer tablet, one layer for immediate release and one layer for extended release so the medicine starts to release right away and last for up to 12 hours
#1 TRUSTED COLD & COUGH BRAND: #1 Cold and Cough brand doctors trust* and #1 Pharmacist Recommended Brand
CONTINUOUS RELIEF: Maximum strength Mucinex DM lasts up to 12 hours so you can say goodbye to retaking medicine every 4 hours

ACTIVE INGREDIENT: Contains Guaifenesin which is an expectorant that relieves chest congestion and thins & loosens mucus making cough more productive and Dextromethorphan HBr which acts as a cough suppressant
USAGE: Use as directed; Adults and Children 12 years of age and over
body.description: Product Description Maximum Strength Mucinex DM Extended-release Bi-layer tablets provide powerful symptom relief. The product controls cough, relieves chest congestion, thins and loosens mucus and lasts for 12 hours. It contains a unique bi-layer tablet - one layer for immediate release and one layer for extended release, so the medicine starts to release right away and lasts for up to 12 hours, so you can say goodbye to retaking medicine every 4 hours. Mucinex is the #1 Cold and Cough brand doctors trust* and the #1 Pharmacist Recommended Brand† as well. This product contains 28 tablets. It can be used by Adults and Children 12 years of age and over. KEY SYMPTOMS RELIEVED: Maximum Strength Mucinex DM Extended-release Bi-layer tablets control cough, relieve chest congestion and thin and loosen mucus ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Contains Guaifenesin which is an expectorant that relieves chest congestion and thins & loosens mucus making cough more productive and Dextromethorphan HBr which acts as a cough suppressant Use as directed *IQVIA using ProVoice Survey, December 2022 †U.S. News & World Report/Pharmacy Times 2023-2024 From the Manufacturer Fight both wet and dry coughs for 12 hours with Maximum Strength Mucinex DM extended-release bi-layer tablets. Not all coughs are the same. Sometimes you can have a wet cough caused by mucus. Other times, you have an irritating dry cough. Whichever type of cough you have, wet or dry, Maximum Strength Mucinex DM will quiet it so you can focus on your life, not your symptoms.Quiets Wet and Dry CoughsMaximum Strength Mucinex DM extended-release tablets help control both wet and dry coughs for 12 hours. In addition, the extended-release tablets start to work quickly to break up mucus and relieve chest congestion.Works for 12 HoursOnly Maximum Strength Mucinex DM has a bi-layer tablet with maximum-strength medicines to fight wet coughs caused by mucus as well as irritating dry coughs. Plus, Mucinex DM works for 12 hours. The extended-release bi-layer tablet is designed with two layers. The first layer is absorbed quickly by your body for fast relief. The other layer dissolves slowly to continue relieving your wet or dry cough for 12 hours.Mucinex: #1 with Doctors, Pharmacists, and ConsumersYou're too busy with family, home, and work to let sickness slow you down. You need a brand you can trust to get the job done. That's why there's Mucinex. Mucinex is the #1 doctor recommended1, #1 pharmacist recommended2 3 and #1 most popular4 OTC expectorant brand. Mucinex products all have the dependable, mucus-busting power to show Mr. Mucus the way out of your system so you can keep up with life.What's in the BoxOne box of Maximum Strength Mucinex DM extended-release tablets (28 tablets per box). Maximum Strength Mucinex DMRelieves these Symptoms:Quiets wet coughs caused by mucusControls irritating dry coughsThins and breaks up mucus to make coughs more productiveUse as directed.Mucinex Has Products for All of Your Worst Symptoms 12 Hour Relief (Tablets)Chest CongestionDry CoughNasal Congestion Maximum Strength Mucinexx Mucinexx Maximum Strength Mucinex DMxx Mucinex DMxx Maximum Strength Mucinex Dxx Mucinex Dxx1 Mucinex is the #1 doctor-recommended OTC expectorant among internists, general practitioners, and family practitioners. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 12 Hour Relief Mucinex DM powers through chest congestion for 12 hours so you can say goodbye to retaking medicine every 4 hours. Cough When you're healthy, the cillia in your airways move mucus toward your through to either be coughed up or swallowed. But with a respiratory tract infection (like the common cold), mucus can build up in your airways and lungs, so your body has to cough to get rid of it. Chest Congestion Chest congestion is what happens when the mucus membranes (mucosa) that line your airways jump into overdrive. When you breathe in an irritant (like dust, bacteria or a virus), mucosa cells are attacked causing inflammation and extra mucus in your airways. This extra mucus is one of the ways your body tries to remove an irritant. Bi-layer Tablets Unique bi-layer tablets - One layer for immediate release, the other layer for extended release.

Q: What symptoms will 12 HR help relieve? A: Mucinex DM 12HR will relieve both cough and chest congestion while Mucinex 12HR will relieve just chest congestion. Q: Can I take 12HR at night? A: Yes, recommended 1 dose every 12 hours. Q: How does Mucinex 12HR last so long? A: Our original bi-layer tablet contains an immediate release layer on one side and extended release layer on the other side which allows extended relief for up to 12 hours! Q: Can Mucinex products be used with other over-the-counter medicine or prescription meds? A: Please speak with your healthcare provider.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well, u just need 2 drink plenty of water to get the best results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Moved from east coast to west coast & developed seasonal allergies for the first time in my life. Constantly trying to cough up phlegm & clear my throat. It’s really bad this year. I can’t sleep or lay flat due to choking/coughing trying to clear throat. Tried various OTC “allergy medicines” which relieved some of my nasal congestion but did nothing for constant throat phlegm. Took 1 of these tablets late last night & finally was able to get a good nights sleep. Woke up this morning with very mild nose congestion. No throat phlegm. None. Amazing! Amazing! Amazing! I will be reordering this product, for sure.
